Common.PostalAddresses.Common.Line1: Coles Mentone Cnr Mentone Pde & Brindisi St
Coles Mentone Cnr Mentone Pde & Brindisi St

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
- Metropolitan Melbourne freestanding Coles Supermarket in a prime bayside location with 7 Year remaining lease term

 - 100% leased blue chip ASX listed tenant - Coles Group Limited (ASX:COL) market capitalisation of $20.5bn and ASX top 50 rated company

 - Strategic corner land holding of 2,637sqm* with favourable and flexible activity centre zoning

 - Located in the heart of the Mentone retail precinct, walking distance to the new Mentone Train Station and surrounded by prestigious private schools

 - Low rent psm and occupancy cost providing underlying security and potential for future rental uplift

 - Serviced at the doorstep by convenient at grade council car parking for 150+ cars

 - Net passing income of $520,000 per annum*

For Sale Via Public Onsite Auction Thursday 28th November 2019 at 12.00pm (AEDT)

For Further information please contact the exclusive sales and marketing agents

Mark Wizel
+61 411 694 756

Justin Dowers
+61 438 098 805

Kevin Tong
+61 422 848 818

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: A ONCE IN A GENERATION FREESTANDING METROPOLITAN MELBOURNE SUPERMARKET INVESTMENT

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
- Currently fully leased to 9 shops, all on separate titles

- Rear car parking of 1,500 sqm*/46* car parks provided on title

- Net passing income of $193,000 per annum*

- Extensive frontage to Florence Street of 52 metres*

- Extremely rare and prominent 2,500 sqm* Mentone bayside land holding

- Surrounded by first class lifestyle attractions including, Port Phillip Bay Beaches (1 km*), renowned golf courses (Royal Melbourne - 2.5 km*), major shopping centres (Southland Shopping Centre – 3km*) and Balcombe Road entertainment drawcards

- In close proximity to a number of schools including Kilbreda College, Mentone Girls Grammar & St Bede’s College, together with medical centres and the major banks

- Strong existing improvements providing the ability to hold, sell down individually or develop (STCA)


*approx

OFFERS RECEIVED

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 9 EXISITING GROUND FLOOR SHOPS + 46* CAR PARKS OVER 2,500 SQM* OF IRREPLACEABLE BAYSIDE LAND

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
+ A magnificent Mentone Village corner comprising 6 fully leased retail shops plus level 1 office

+ 50m* of priceless frontage to the thriving Mentone Retail Village, anchored by major supermarkets Coles and Woolworths and many more popular retailers

+ Directly adjacent the Mentone Train Station and immediately fronting the new Mentone Piazza, a $3.4 million government investment to improve public spaces

+ Diverse annual income of $190,090* + GST + Outgoings (after land tax) from seven (7) separate tenancies

+ An underutilised corner landholding of 534sqm* with future potential to add value through development (STCA)

FOR SALE VIA PUBLIC ON-SITE AUCTION THURSDAY 28TH NOVEMBER AT 1.30PM (AEDT)

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: OUTSTANDING MENTONE VILLAGE CORNER - 6 RETAIL SHOPS + LEVEL 1 OFFICE + MORE THAN 50M* OF PRICELESS FRONTAGE

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Rare opportunity to acquire 2,245sqm* of high exposure retail space PLUS 77 secure basement car parks (on title)

Huge corner frontage to the thriving Mentone retail village, opposite the heavily trafficked Mentone Train Station

Surrounded by an array of popular retailers including both major supermarkets in Coles and Woolworths

Strategically positioned in an affluent and growing area, with a current median house price of  $940,000 as at 2015, growing at almost 25% in the past 12 months

Potential to occupy, invest or re-position

FOR IMMEDIATE SALE

To arrange a personal inspection or for further information please contact the exclusive sales & marketing agents CBRE Melbourne Strip Retail Investments

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: ATTENTION OWNER OCCUPIERS AND VALUE ADD INVESTORS

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Anchored by Bunnings, Spotlight and Aldi

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE Large Format Retail is pleased to present as the exclusive agents the Bayside's largest and most exciting Large Format Retail development, the Mentone Centre FOR LEASE.

Act quick to secure the final showroom and join Bunnings, Aldi, Spotlight and many more.  This recently opened 36,000sqm centre comprises 14 dominant brands with multi-directional access via traffic lights from the Nepean Highway and over 760 on grade customer car parks. The Mentone Centre sets a new standard for Bulky Goods retailing along the famous Nepean Highway.

- Anchored Australia's largest Bunnings Warehouse.
- Multi directional access via traffic lights from the Nepean Highway.
- Access to over 760 car bays
- Immediate proximity to Westfield's Southland Shopping Centre.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: FOR LEASE: The Mentone Centre -  27-29 Nepean Highway, Mentone
